Header: Firefighters respond to heavy flooding in southern France
Content: French firefighters responded to severe flooding after torrential rain hammered the south of the country. Video filmed by the SDIS 06 fire department shows firefighters battling through flood waters in the southern town of Mandelieu-la-Napoule. The department said that it had received 1,800 calls. 52 people have been rescued from the rising waters, the fire brigade said in a social media post.
